Action (imperative): Create Contact with properties: lifecycle_stage='Lead', original_source='{{original_source}}'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Initialize the contact from marketing capture to start the sales cycle.

Action (imperative): Create Company and associate it to the Contact.
Reason (why this action is taken): Ensure the account container exists and ties to the contact for attribution.

Action (imperative): Copy original_source from Contact to Company.
Reason (why this action is taken): Keep source attribution consistent across related records.

Action (imperative): Create Note: 'Initial marketing form captured; nurture emails initiated.'
Reason (why this action is taken): Record the first meaningful activity for auditability.

Action (imperative): Update Contact: set lifecycle_stage='Marketing Qualified Lead'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Contact met MQL criteria based on engagement score or content consumption.

Action (imperative): Update Company: set lifecycle_stage='Marketing Qualified Lead'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Keep company lifecycle aligned to the primary contact.

Action (imperative): Create Deal with properties: stage='Opportunity', amount='{{amount}}', currency='{{currency}}', expected_close='{{expected_close}}'.
Reason (why this action is taken): A qualified opportunity has been identified and needs pipeline tracking.

Action (imperative): Update Contact: set lifecycle_stage='Sales Qualified Lead'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Deal creation signals sales acceptance of the lead.

Action (imperative): Update Company: set lifecycle_stage='Sales Qualified Lead'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Keep company lifecycle aligned to the primary contact.

Action (imperative): Create Ticket: category='Quotation', subject='Custom quote/docs requested', status='Open'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Track documentation/quotation requests that affect buying readiness.

Action (imperative): Create Note: 'Quote sent; terms and delivery outlined; awaiting approvals.'
Reason (why this action is taken): Capture the commercial offer details and next steps.

Action (imperative): Create Note: 'Follow-up on quote; finance review in progress; no blockers reported.'
Reason (why this action is taken): Maintain status visibility across stakeholders.

Action (imperative): Create Note: 'Negotiations nearing final terms; legal review pending.'
Reason (why this action is taken): Document late-stage negotiation status for leadership.

Action (imperative): Create Note: 'Verbal approval received; PO requested from buyer.'
Reason (why this action is taken): Trigger internal readiness for contract and payment steps.

Action (imperative): Create Note: 'PO received; awaiting payment confirmation.'
Reason (why this action is taken): Mark the transition from negotiation to payment processing.

Action (imperative): Create Ticket: category='Payment', subject='Payment method issue', status='In Progress'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Resolve blockers that could delay deal closure.

Action (imperative): Create Note: 'Payment confirmed; prepare fulfillment/onboarding.'
Reason (why this action is taken): Signal operations to begin post-sale processes.

Action (imperative): Update Deal: set stage='Closed Won'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Complete the sales cycle and trigger downstream automations.

Action (imperative): Update Contact: set lifecycle_stage='Customer'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Reflect Closed Won outcome on the contact for accurate lifecycle reporting.

Action (imperative): Update Company: set lifecycle_stage='Customer'.
Reason (why this action is taken): Keep account-level lifecycle synchronized with contact and deal.

Action (imperative): Create Note: 'Post-sale onboarding initiated; thank-you communication sent.'
Reason (why this action is taken): Document the handoff to CS/operations and close the feedback loop.
